required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: An Open-label Phase I Study of Orally Available Novel Small-molecule Fibroblast Growth Factor Receptors (FGFR) 1,2,3 and 4 Inhibitor, ASP5878 at Single and Multiple Doses in Patients With Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label Phase I Study of Oral ASP5878 at Single and Multiple Doses in Patients With Solid Tumors

brief_summary.textblock: The objectives of this study are to determine the tolerability, safety, pharmacokinetics (PK), pharmacodynamics (PD), and efficacy of oral ASP5878 in participants with solid tumors.

detailed_description.textblock: This study consists of two parts. In the dose-escalation part, ASP5878 (orally available novel small-molecule FGFR 1,2,3 and 4 inhibitor, multiple dosing once-a-day (q.d.), multiple dosing twice-a-day (b.i.d.) or 5-day on/2-day off dosing twice-a-day (5on-2off)) is administered to participants with solid tumors in an increasing dose manner, and the tolerability, safety, pharmacokinetics (PK), pharmacodynamics (PD) and efficacy of ASP5878 are evaluated in these participants. Cycle 0 consists of 3 days and Cycle 1 and subsequent cycles consist of 28 days each in the dose-escalation part. In the expansion part, 16mg twice-a-day 5-day on/2-day off dose of ASP5878 (5on-2off) is administered to participants with solid tumors and safety, PK, PD and efficacy of ASP5878 are evaluated. The expansion part starts from Cycle 1 and each cycle consists of 28 days.

primary_outcome.measure: Dose-escalation part and Expansion part: Safety assessed by Adverse Events (AEs)
primary_outcome.description: Until one of the discontinuation criteria is met.

primary_outcome.measure: Dose-escalation part and Expansion part:Safety assessed by Vital signs
primary_outcome.description: Blood pressure, pulse rate and body temperature, Until one of the discontinuation criteria is met.

primary_outcome.measure: Dose-escalation part and Expansion part:Safety assessed by Body weight
primary_outcome.description: Until one of the discontinuation criteria is met.

primary_outcome.measure: Dose-escalation part and Expansion part:Safety assessed by Laboratory tests
primary_outcome.description: Hematology, blood biochemistry, blood coagulation tests and urinalysis, until one of the discontinuation criteria is met.

primary_outcome.measure: Dose-escalation part and Expansion part:Safety assessed by 12-lead ECGs
primary_outcome.description: ECG: Electrocardiogram, until one of the discontinuation criteria is met.

primary_outcome.measure: Dose-escalation part and Expansion part: Ophthalmology
primary_outcome.description: Eyesight, funduscopy, slit lamp microscopy, and Optical Coherence Tomography, until one of the discontinuation criteria is met.

primary_outcome.measure: Dose-escalation part and Expansion part: Bone density measurement
primary_outcome.description: Until one of the discontinuation criteria is met.

primary_outcome.measure: Dose-escalation part and Expansion part: Computed tomography (CT) Imaging assessment
primary_outcome.description: Until one of the discontinuation criteria is met.
Until one of the discontinuation criteria is met.

secondary_outcome.measure: Dose-escalation part: Pharmacokinetics (PK) parameter of ASP5878 in plasma: Cmax
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 at Cycle 0 and Day 5 (5on-2off) or 27 (q.d./b.i.d.) at Cycle 1
secondary_outcome.description: Cmax: Maximum concentration, Cycle 0: single dose, Cycle 1: multiple dose after Cycle 0

secondary_outcome.measure: Dose-escalation part:PK parameter of ASP5878 in plasma: tmax
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 at Cycle 0 and Day 5 (5on-2off) or 27 (q.d./b.i.d.) at Cycle 1
secondary_outcome.description: tmax: Time of Cmax

secondary_outcome.measure: Dose-escalation part:PK parameter of ASP5878 in plasma: AUClast
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 at Cycle 0 and Day 5 (5on-2off) or 27 (q.d./b.i.d.) at Cycle 1
secondary_outcome.description: AUClast: Area under the concentration-time curve from the time of dosing extrapolated to the last measurable concentration

secondary_outcome.measure: Dose-escalation part: PK parameter of ASP5878 in plasma: AUCinf
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 at Cycle 0 and Day 5 (5on-2off) or 27 (q.d./b.i.d.) at Cycle 1
secondary_outcome.description: AUCinf: Area under the concentration-time curve from the time of dosing extrapolated to time infinity

secondary_outcome.measure: Dose-escalation part: PK parameter of ASP5878 in plasma: t1/2
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 at Cycle 0 and Day 5 (5on-2off) or 27 (q.d./b.i.d.) at Cycle 1
secondary_outcome.description: t1/2: Terminal elimination half-life

secondary_outcome.measure: Dose-escalation part: PK parameter of ASP5878 in plasma: CL/F
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 at Cycle 0 and Day 5 (5on-2off) or 27 (q.d./b.i.d.) at Cycle 1
secondary_outcome.description: CL/F: Apparent total systemic clearance

secondary_outcome.measure: Dose-escalation part: PK parameter of ASP5878 in plasma: Vz/F
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 at Cycle 0 and Day 5 (5on-2off) or 27 (q.d./b.i.d.) at Cycle 1
secondary_outcome.description: Vz/F: Apparent volume of distribution during the terminal elimination phase

secondary_outcome.measure: Dose-escalation part: PK parameter of ASP5878 in urine: Ae
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 at Cycle 0 and Day 5 (5on-2off) or 27 (q.d./b.i.d.) at Cycle 1
secondary_outcome.description: Ae: Amount of ASP5878 excreted into the urine

secondary_outcome.measure: Dose-escalation part: PK parameter of ASP5878 in urine: CLR
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 at Cycle 0 and Day 5 (5on-2off) or 27 (q.d./b.i.d.) at Cycle 1
secondary_outcome.description: CLR: Renal clearance

secondary_outcome.measure: Dose-escalation part: Pharmacodynamic (PD) parameter: Serum FGF23 concentrations
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 at Cycle 0 and Day 5 (5on-2off) or 27 (q.d./b.i.d.) at Cycle 1
secondary_outcome.description: FGF: Fibroblast Growth Factor

secondary_outcome.measure: Dose-escalation part: PD parameter: Serum inorganic phosphorus concentrations
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 at Cycle 0 and Day 5 (5on-2off) or 27 (q.d./b.i.d.) at Cycle 1

secondary_outcome.measure: Dose-escalation part: PD parameter: Serum calcium concentrations
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 at Cycle 0 and Day 5 (5on-2off) or 27 (q.d./b.i.d.) at Cycle 1

secondary_outcome.measure: Dose-escalation part: PD parameter: Serum iPTH concentrations
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 at Cycle 0 and Day 5 (5on-2off) or 27 (q.d./b.i.d.) at Cycle 1
secondary_outcome.description: iPTH: Intact Parathyroid Hormone

secondary_outcome.measure: Dose-escalation part: PD parameter: Serum calcitriol concentrations
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 1 at Cycle 0 and Day 5 (5on-2off) or 27 (q.d./b.i.d.) at Cycle 1

secondary_outcome.measure: Expansion part: PK parameter of ASP5878 in plasma: Cmax
Expansion part: PK parameter of ASP5878 in plasma: tmax
Expansion part: PK parameter of ASP5878 in plasma: AUClast

Expansion part: PK parameter of ASP5878 in plasma: CL/F

secondary_outcome.description: Until one of the discontinuation criteria is met.

secondary_outcome.measure: Expansion part: PD parameter: Serum FGF23 concentrations
secondary_outcome.description: Until one of the discontinuation criteria is met.

secondary_outcome.measure: Expansion part: PD parameter: Serum inorganic phosphorus concentrations
secondary_outcome.description: Until one of the discontinuation criteria is met.

secondary_outcome.measure: Expansion part: PD parameter: Serum iPTH concentrations
secondary_outcome.description: Until one of the discontinuation criteria is met.

secondary_outcome.measure: Expansion part: PD parameter: Serum calcitriol concentrations
secondary_outcome.description: Until one of the discontinuation criteria is met.

secondary_outcome.measure: Expansion part: PD parameter: Serum 7α-hydroxy-4-cholesten-3-one
secondary_outcome.description: Until one of the discontinuation criteria is met

secondary_outcome.measure: Expansion part: Overall response
secondary_outcome.description: Antitumor activity evaluated based on RECIST version 1.1, until one of the discontinuation criteria is met. Antitumor response is rated on a 4-level scale shown below (complete response [CR], partial response [PR], progressive disease [PD] and stable disease [SD]).

secondary_outcome.measure: Expansion part: Maximum Shrinkage in Target Lesion
secondary_outcome.description: Best percent change from baseline in the sum of diameters of all target lesions.

secondary_outcome.measure: Expansion part: Progression free survival (PFS)
secondary_outcome.description: Time from the start of the study treatment until death from any cause or Progressive Disease assessed according to RECIST 1.1.

secondary_outcome.measure: Expansion part: Time to progression (TTP)
secondary_outcome.description: Time from the start of the study treatment until Progressive Disease assessed according to RECIST 1.1.

secondary_outcome.measure: Expansion part: Time to treatment failure (TTF)
secondary_outcome.description: Time from the start of the study drug treatment until discontinuation of study drug treatment for any reason.

secondary_outcome.measure: Expansion part: Overall survival (OS)
secondary_outcome.description: Time from randomization to death from any cause.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Expansion part Squamous Cell Lung Carcinoma

intervention.arm_group_label: Expansion part Squamous Cell Lung Carcinoma

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Histologically or cytologically confirmed solid tumor.
- Participant must meet at least one of the following criteria in the judgment of the investigator or sub-investigator:
- Disease progression despite standard therapies
- Progressive disease without any standard therapies established
- Standard therapies are considered intolerable
- Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance status 0 or 1.
- Predicted life expectancy ≥ 12 weeks in the judgment of the investigator or sub-investigator.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participant with ≥ Grade 2 (CTCAE v 4.0-JCOG) persistent symptoms and objective findings due to the toxicity attributable to prior treatment with antitumor effect (except alopecia).
- Participant who received a prior treatment intended for antitumor effect (medication, surgery, radiotherapy, etc.) within 4 weeks prior to the planned first day of study drug dosing (or participant who received mitomycin C or Nitrosourea within 6 weeks prior to the planned first day of study drug dosing).
- A major surgical procedure within 4 weeks prior to the planned first day of study drug dosing or a surgical procedure is planned during the course of the study.
- Participant who were treated with other investigational drug or medical device within 4 weeks prior to the planned first day of study drug dosing.
- Participant who has a history of organ transplantation.
- Participant with a brain metastasis with symptoms or requiring treatment.

link.description: Link to results on the Astellas Clinical Study Results website

patient_data.ipd_description: Access to anonymized individual participant level data collected during the trial, in addition to study-related supporting documentation, is planned for trials conducted with approved product indications and formulations, as well as compounds terminated during development. Conditions and exceptions are described under the Sponsor Specific Details for Astellas on www.clinicalstudydatarequest.com.
patient_data.ipd_time_frame: Access to participant level data is offered to researchers after publication of the primary manuscript (if applicable) and is available as long as Astellas has legal authority to provide the data.
patient_data.ipd_access_criteria: Researchers must submit a proposal to conduct a scientifically relevant analysis of the study data. The research proposal is reviewed by an Independent Research Panel. If the proposal is approved, access to the study data is provided in a secure data sharing environment after receipt of a signed Data Sharing Agreement.
